name: juan-dev
description: Freelance Front-End Developer, automation nerd, and astronomy enthusiast.

scripts.build:dev: npm run css && npm run js && npm run development
scripts.build:staging: npm run css && npm run js && npm run staging
scripts.build: npm run css && npm run js && npm run production
scripts.css:post: postcss src/*.css -d src && postcss src/_includes/components/critical.css -o src/_includes/components/critical.css
scripts.css: npm run css:compile && npm run css:post
scripts.js:compile: babel assets/js/ --out-file src/scripts.js && babel assets/fonts.js --out-file src/_includes/components/fonts.js && babel assets/sw.js --out-file src/sw.js && babel assets/ww.js --out-file src/ww.js
scripts.js:post: terser src/scripts.js -o src/scripts.js -c -m && terser src/_includes/components/fonts.js -o src/_includes/components/fonts.js && terser src/sw.js -o src/sw.js -c -m && terser src/ww.js -o src/ww.js -c -m
scripts.js: npm run js:compile && npm run js:post
scripts.start: concurrently 'npm run css:watch' 'npm run js:watch' 'npm run serve'

author: Juan Villela
